hitos.title: Milestones at INEL
hitos.description: These relevant events represent significant advances that have marked the growth of our organization.
hitos.2017: On June 28, we founded Inel, Technical School of Engineering.
hitos.2018: We opened up to new audiences across Latin America
hitos.2020: We reached 40 courses, 6 programs, and specialized 5000 students at the highest level.
hitos.2022: On June 20, we participated for the first time in the most important event in our sector: Expo Energía Perú 2022.
hitos.2023: We were approved as providers of IEEE CEU/PDH Certificates.
